application_details: The '753 Patent primarily describes a delivery system applicable to numerous active ingredients, including lansoprazole.
decision_reasoning: Claims related to lansoprazole are narrow expressions of the delivery system, not claims to the medicine or its use.
cost_awards: Takeda also awarded costs for defending allegations.
procedure_followed: Motion brought under par. 6(5)(a) of the Regulations; evidence reviewed, claims analyzed, and legal precedents considered.
